document_data.name: Halmuth Bruil
document_data.mainbody: '''Halmuth Bruil''' was the commander of Melvaunt's army and one of the seven councilors that ruled [[Melvaunt]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Halmuth, as Lord of the Keys, ruled over the army and the city watch of Melvaunt.
document_data.History: In 1374 DR, some scions of the noble houses went on adventures and disappeared, including the heir of [[Bruil|House Bruil]], [[Argens Bruil]]. Halmuth did not care, being more concerned with the increasing activity of [[orc]]s from [[Thar]]. He spoke with the adventuring party hired by Lord [[Woarsten Nanther]] to find the scions, saying that they'd left from of the northern gate together with the [[dwarf]] adventurer [[Dorn Crownshield]].
document_data.Personality: Halmuth was well known for his brutality, but he was also a very cunning individual, very talented in tactics and strategies. He cared nothing for the missing scions.
